name: Grimmia, the Savior of Myth
text:
Continuous: Whenever this card attacks, you may search your main deck for a weapon [Addition:J/Resonator] and add it to this card. Then shuffle your main deck.
Activate. Pay W: This card gains Swiftness and Target Attack until end of turn.
Activate. Pay WW, banish an addition added to this card: Rest up to two target J/resonators.
